text: Craig Robinson may refer to: *Craig Robinson (actor) (born 1971), actor; played Darryl Philbin on NBC's The Office *Craig Robinson (baseball) (born 1948), former Major League baseball player *Craig Robinson (basketball) (born 1962), college coach and brother of Michelle Obama *Craig Robinson (designer) (born 1972), American fashion designer *Craig Robinson (rugby league) (born 1986), rugby league footballer
title: Craig Robinson
